title: Technavio Says Change in Demographics Will Expand the Gambling Market in the UK Through 2019

Mon, Jul 6, 2015, 17:23 BST - UK Markets closed Technavio Says Change in Demographics Will Expand the Gambling Market in the UK Through 2019 Press Release : Technavio Research – 48 minutes ago Print 
LONDON--(BUSINESSWIRE)-- 
Technavio has published a new report on the gambling market in the UK ,which is expected to grow at a CAGR of more than 5% from 2015-2019. 
About the Report 
The new Technavio report draws attention towards remote gambling, which is growing at the highest rate of all the segments in the gambling market in the UK, and is estimated to grow at a CAGR of over 13% during the forecast period. 
“The main factors driving the remote gambling market are the increasing use of the Internet and the increasing number of women gamblers, which is considered a major revenue contributor to the gambling market in the UK,” says Faisal Ghaus, Vice President of Technavio. 
Keeping with this theme, the report also highlights the fact that gambling has traditionally been dominated by men. However, the market has expanded to include participation from more women, young people, and the older population. 
“A rise in government involvement and rapidly changing regulations have changed people's perception of gambling, and made it accessible as a social activity for a much broader group of people,” adds Ghaus. 
Market Scope and Calculation of Market Size 
The new Technavio report covers the present scenario and growth prospects of the gambling market in the UK from 2015-2019. To calculate the market size, the report takes into account GGY generated from betting, remote, lottery, and gaming.
